alert.note: Alert for Phillips; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 03 at 4:16PM CDT until October 03 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Smith County in north central Kansas... Northeastern Phillips County in north central Kansas... Franklin County in south central Nebraska... Southeastern Harlan County in south central Nebraska... * Until 445 PM CDT. * At 416 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles northwest of Agra, or 12 miles northeast of Phillipsburg, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 403 PM CDT, golf ball size hail was reported on the north side of Phillipsburg. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Naponee and Bloomington around 430 PM CDT. Franklin around 435 PM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Hastings.
